member.name: M:Ektron.Cms.Site.EkSite.GetAllSyncableRelationsForFolder(System.Int64)
member.summary: Returns all the sync relations for a folder that are currently able to be synced.

member.name: M:Ektron.Cms.Site.EkSite.GetAllSyncableRelationsForContent(System.Int64,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns all the sync relations for a content that are currently able to be synced.
